articles.title: Meta refuses to sign EU’s AI code of practice
articles.description: Meta will not sign the EU's new rules, calling the implementation "overreach" and claiming it will throttle AI development.
articles.author: Ram Iyer
articles.content: Meta will not sign the EU's new rules, calling the implementation "overreach" and claiming it will throttle AI development.

articles.title: NIH researchers identify brain circuits responsible for visual acuity
articles.description: Studies demonstrate the effect of retinal injury on visual processing pathways, providing insights for the development of vision restoration therapies.
articles.content: Studies demonstrate the effect of retinal injury on visual processing pathways, providing insights for the development of vision restoration therapies.

articles.title: NIH scientists test in an animal model a surgical technique to improve cell therapy for dry AMD
articles.description: The technique may enable higher doses and combinations of cell therapies.
articles.content: The technique may enable higher doses and combinations of cell therapies.

articles.title: Taxmann, EY India Launch AI Platform for Tax Research and Drafting
articles.description: Users can also analyse complex legal documents, extract insights, identify similar legal precedents, and integrate results into Microsoft Word. The post Taxmann, EY India Launch AI Platform for Tax Research and Drafting appeared first on Analytics India Magazine.

articles.title: Reasoning reimagined: Introducing Phi-4-mini-flash-reasoning

articles.title: Unsupervised, generalizable method for doing anomaly detection
articles.description: An ensemble of models, weighted according to their reluctance to flag anomalies, outperforms its predecessors.
articles.author: Abishek Sankararaman
articles.content: An ensemble of models, weighted according to their reluctance to flag anomalies, outperforms its predecessors.

articles.title: NIST Ion Clock Sets New Record for Most Accurate Clock in the World
articles.description: This new result contributes to the international effort to define the second with a much greater level of accuracy than before, enabling new scientific and technological advances.
articles.author: Sarah Henderson
articles.content: This new result contributes to the international effort to define the second with a much greater level of accuracy than before, enabling new scientific and technological advances.

articles.title: NIH study links particulate air pollution to increased mutations in lung cancers among nonsmokers
articles.description: Whole-genome sequencing study found air pollution to cause more cancer-related changes than secondhand smoke.
articles.content: Whole-genome sequencing study found air pollution to cause more cancer-related changes than secondhand smoke.

articles.title: Intellectual freedom by design
articles.description: ChatGPT is designed to be useful, trustworthy, and adaptable—so you can make it your own.
articles.content: ChatGPT is designed to be useful, trustworthy, and adaptable—so you can make it your own.

articles.title: Build real-time travel recommendations using AI agents on Amazon Bedrock
articles.description: In this post, we show how to build a generative AI solution using Amazon Bedrock that creates bespoke holiday packages by combining customer profiles and preferences with real-time pricing data. We demonstrate how to use Amazon Bedrock Knowledge Bases for travel information, Amazon Bedrock Agents for real-time flight details, and Amazon OpenSearch Serverless for efficient package search and retrieval.
articles.author: Vishnu Vardhini
articles.content: In this post, we show how to build a generative AI solution using Amazon Bedrock that creates bespoke holiday packages by combining customer profiles and preferences with real-time pricing data. We demonstrate how to use Amazon Bedrock Knowledge Bases for travel information, Amazon Bedrock Agents for real-time flight details, and Amazon OpenSearch Serverless for efficient package search and retrieval.

articles.title: Evaluating generative AI models with Amazon Nova LLM-as-a-Judge on Amazon SageMaker AI
articles.description: Evaluating the performance of large language models (LLMs) goes beyond statistical metrics like perplexity or bilingual evaluation understudy (BLEU) scores. For most real-world generative AI scenarios, it’s crucial to understand whether a model is producing better outputs than a baseline or an earlier iteration. This is especially important for applications such as summarization, content generation, […]
articles.author: Surya Kari
articles.content: Evaluating the performance of large language models (LLMs) goes beyond statistical metrics like perplexity or bilingual evaluation understudy (BLEU) scores. For most real-world generative AI scenarios, it’s crucial to understand whether a model is producing better outputs than a baseline or an earlier iteration. This is especially important for applications such as summarization, content generation, […]

articles.title: Amazon Bedrock Knowledge Bases now supports Amazon OpenSearch Service Managed Cluster as vector store
articles.description: Amazon Bedrock Knowledge Bases has extended its vector store options by enabling support for Amazon OpenSearch Service managed clusters, further strengthening its capabilities as a fully managed Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) solution. This enhancement builds on the core functionality of Amazon Bedrock Knowledge Bases , which is designed to seamlessly connect foundation models (FMs) with internal data sources. This post provides a comprehensive, step-by-step guide on integrating an Amazon...
articles.author: Manoj Selvakumar
articles.content: Amazon Bedrock Knowledge Bases has extended its vector store options by enabling support for Amazon OpenSearch Service managed clusters, further strengthening its capabilities as a fully managed Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) solution. This enhancement builds on the core functionality of Amazon Bedrock Knowledge Bases , which is designed to seamlessly connect foundation models (FMs) with internal data sources. This post provides a comprehensive, step-by-step guide on integrating an Amazon...

articles.title: How Rapid7 automates vulnerability risk scores with ML pipelines using Amazon SageMaker AI
articles.description: In this post, we share how Rapid7 implemented end-to-end automation for the training, validation, and deployment of ML models that predict CVSS vectors. Rapid7 customers have the information they need to accurately understand their risk and prioritize remediation measures.
articles.author: Jimmy Cancilla
articles.content: In this post, we share how Rapid7 implemented end-to-end automation for the training, validation, and deployment of ML models that predict CVSS vectors. Rapid7 customers have the information they need to accurately understand their risk and prioritize remediation measures.
